activities: iRobot transfers personal information about its employees (past or present) collected in the context of the employment relationship.  The main reason for the transfer of this employee data is for human resources administration and payroll processing.
corpofftitle1: Executive VP Human Resources & Corporate Communications
personaldata: Employee’s personal information is collected and may be transmitted in paper or electronic form.  This data may or may not be processed manually and could contain, but is not limited to: payroll records, performance evaluations, benefits data, and financial account information.
recoursemech: iRobot will cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
